titleInfo.title: Advertising Card for Ben Wisebart, Clothier

physicalDescription.extent: 2 item (advertising card), 5 x 3 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#232 Ben Wisebart, Clothier Advertising card, not photo, but do treat as graphic''.

mods.abstract: Advertising card that reads "Ben Wisebart Wide Awake Clothier, 366 Larimer St., Denver, Colorado." Wisebart was elected mayor of Central City, Colo. in 1876. His sister was Frances Wisebart Jacobs. This photograph of the card was taken circa 1978.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 12.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
